hints.title: Complete Framework for Riemannian Volumes on Fractal Set
hints.content:
1613: :label: thm-complete-volume-framework
1614: 
1615: The following computational framework is established:
1616: 
1617: **1. Two-dimensional areas (plaquettes, surfaces):**
1618: - Algorithm: Fan triangulation {prf:ref}`alg-fan-triangulation-area`
1619: - Error: $O(h^2)$ for mesh size $h$
1620: - Use: Wilson loop action, curvature estimation
1621: 
1622: **2. Three-dimensional volumes (regions, cells):**
1623: - Algorithm: Delaunay tetrahedral decomposition {prf:ref}`alg-tetrahedral-volume`
1624: - Formula: Gram determinant for tetrahedra
1625: - Use: Phase space volume, entropy
1626: 
1627: **3. General d-dimensional volumes:**
1628: - Algorithm: Simplicial decomposition {prf:ref}`alg-simplicial-decomposition`
1629: - Formula: $V_g(S) = \frac{1}{d!} \sqrt{\det G}$ for d-simplex
1630: - Use: High-dimensional state spaces
1631: 
1632: **4. Monte Carlo integration:**
1633: - Direct integration if episodes sample from $\sqrt{\det g}$ (QSD)
1634: - Importance sampling correction for arbitrary distributions
1635: - Convergence: $O(N^{-1/2})$ regardless of dimension
